metadata.title: CVE-2018-5816 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An integer overflow error within the "identify()" function(internal/dcraw_common.cpp) in LibRaw versions prior to 0.18.12 can beexploited to trigger a division by zero via specially crafted NOKIARAW file(Note: This vulnerability is caused due to an incomplete fix ofCVE-2018-5804).

criterions.comment: darktable package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
exactimage package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
dcraw package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
rawtherapee package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
kodi package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
